name: Find someone else
description:
Find someone else is a visual novel about the ever-changing nature of relationships, the hardships of dealing with loss and the unfair inevitability of illness and death.

Step into the shoes of Noah, a tired protagonist, trying to cope with his girlfriendâ€™s worsening illness.
1+ hour story with many different paths to follow.
Explore the darker sides of Stockholm in the company of complex and lost characters.
Is love unconditional?
